translation: Renouncing all actions in Me, with the mind centered on the Self, free from hope and egoism, and from mental fever, fight thou.
commentary: 3.30 Mayi in Me? All of them all? Karmani actions? Sannyasya renouncing? Adhyatmacetasa with the mind centered in the Self? Nirashih free from hope? Nirmamah free from egoism? being having become fight (thou)? Vigatajvaraá¸¥ free from (mental) fever.Commentary Surrender all the actions to Me with the thought? I perform all actions for the sake of the Lord.Fever means grief? sorrow. (Cf.V.10XVIII.66).
